title: Navigation to Getting Started Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has not yet completed onboarding
custom_steps: WHEN the user freshly opens the app
custom_expected:
THEN the Welcome Screen should display the following elements:
- Getting Started Button
- Log In Button
- Restore Purchase Button

title: Navigation to Favorites Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has not yet completed onboarding
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Get Started Button on the Getting Started Screen
custom_expected:
THEN the Favorites Screen should display with the following elements:
- Favorite Team header
- American League label
- National League label
- East, Central, and West labels for American and National leagues
- Default Favorite Title label
- Default Favorite Body label
- Next Button
- Skip label
- Skip Button

title: Navigation to Welcome Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has not yet completed onboarding
custom_steps:
- WHEN the user selects the Get Started Button on the Getting Started Screen
- WHEN the user skips the Favorites Screen
custom_expected:
THEN the Welcome Screen should display with the following elements:
- MLB logo with text
- Create Account title label
- Create Account body label
- Create Free Account button
- Browse Subscriptions button
- Explore Free Content button
- Login label
- Login button
- Disclaimer label

title: Create Account Elements
custom_preconds:
- GIVEN the user has not yet completed onboarding
- GIVEN the user has navigated to the Create Account Screen
custom_expected:
THEN the following elements should appear on screen:
- MLB logo image
- Create Account header label
- Email textbox
- Password textbox
- Password rules label
- Newsletter checkbox
- Newsletter label
- Create Account button
- Cancel Button
- Terms of Use label

title: Invalid Email Input
custom_preconds:
- GIVEN the user has not yet completed onboarding
- GIVEN the user has navigated to the Create Account Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN attempts to create an account with any of the following invalid email inputs:
- Email with no @ character
- Email with more than one @ character
custom_expected: THEN the invalid email error will show on screen

title: Invalid Password Input
custom_preconds:
- GIVEN the user has not yet completed onboarding
- GIVEN the user has navigated to the Create Account Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN attempts to create an account with any of the following invalid password inputs:
- Password without at least one uppercase character
- Password without at least one lowercase character
- Password without at least one special character
- Password with more than 15 characters
- Password with less than 8 characters
custom_expected: THEN the invalid password error will show on screen

title: Missing Email Input
custom_preconds:
- GIVEN the user has not yet completed onboarding
- GIVEN the user has navigated to the Create Account Screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to create an account without entering an email
custom_expected: THEN the invalid email error will show on screen

title: Missing Password Input
custom_preconds:
- GIVEN the user has not yet completed onboarding
- GIVEN the user has navigated to the Create Account Screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to create an account without entering a password
custom_expected: THEN the invalid password error will show on screen

title: Login Detail
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Settings Screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the "LogIn" settings row
custom_expected: THEN the detail view will show the "Log In" secondary text
